tool_description: This API provides access to detailed information about municipalities and settlements within Qatar. You can use it to retrieve data for specific municipalities or settlements, or to get a comprehensive overview of all available information
name: Qatar Municipality And Settlement Information
title: Qatar Municipality And Settlement Information

api_list.name: Get Settlements by Municipalitykey
api_list.description: This API retrieves information about settlements within a specified municipality in Qata

api_list.name: Get Municipality text by ISO 639-1 language codes
api_list.description: Get Municipality text by ISO 639-1 language codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com/lng/ar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com/lng/{ar}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Qatar settlements and zone API
api_list.description: Get all Qatari settlements and their zone numbers.

api_list.name: Get Settlements by Municipality Key and Zone Number in Qatar
api_list.description: This API retrieves information about settlements within a specific municipality and zone in Qatar.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com/get/1/77"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Municipality Information by Municipality Key in Qatar
api_list.description: This API retrieves detailed information about a specific municipality in Qatar.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com/getinfo/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://qatar-municipality-and-settlement-information.p.rapidapi.com/getinfo/{municipalitykey}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
